Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.card.window_pattern_card.Cell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that define a Cell of Window Pattern Card.
    Author:
    Luca Genoni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiceColor getColorRestriction()
      if the color is null you can place a dice with any color, otherwise you must place a dice with the same color
      Dice getDice()
      normal get for the dice in the cell, null if there is no dice
      int getValueRestriction()
      if the value is 0 you can place a dice with any value, otherwise you must place a dice with the same value
      void insertDice(Dice newDice, boolean checkColorRestriction, boolean checkValueRestriction)
      Insert the dice in the cell if the restriction of the cell are respected.
      Dice removeDice()
      remove the dice from the Cell
      void setColorRestriction(DiceColor colorRestriction)
      for setting a restriction of color
      void setDice(Dice dice)
      for setting a dice (used for the load of a game)
      void setValueRestriction(int valueRestriction)
      for setting a restriction of value

    • Method Detail

      • getValueRestriction

        public int getValueRestriction()
        if the value is 0 you can place a dice with any value, otherwise you must place a dice with the same value
        Returns:
        the required value to allow the insertion of the dice

      • getColorRestriction

        public DiceColor getColorRestriction()
        if the color is null you can place a dice with any color, otherwise you must place a dice with the same color
        Returns:
        the required color to allow the insertion of the dice

      • getDice

        public Dice getDice()
        normal get for the dice in the cell, null if there is no dice
        Returns:
        the dice in this cell

      • setValueRestriction

        public void setValueRestriction(int valueRestriction)
        for setting a restriction of value
        Parameters:
        valueRestriction - a dice for being inserted here need to have this value

      • setColorRestriction

        public void setColorRestriction(DiceColor colorRestriction)
        for setting a restriction of color
        Parameters:
        colorRestriction - a dice for being inserted here need to have this color

      • setDice

        public void setDice(Dice dice)
        for setting a dice (used for the load of a game)
        Parameters:
        dice - to set in this cell

      • insertDice

        public void insertDice(Dice newDice,
                       boolean checkColorRestriction,
                       boolean checkValueRestriction)
                throws CellException
        Insert the dice in the cell if the restriction of the cell are respected.
        Parameters:
        newDice - to insert in the cell
        checkColorRestriction - true if i need to check the restriction
        checkValueRestriction - true if i need to check the restriction
        Throws:
        CellException

      • removeDice

        public Dice removeDice()
                throws NoDiceInThisCell
        remove the dice from the Cell
        Returns:
        the dice removed
        Throws:
        NoDiceInThisCell
